attributes.action: Dissolve Parliament as soon as possible for a General Election.
attributes.additional_details:
The current situation regarding the UK government is a self-serving shambles by the Conservatives, who aim to maintain their slippery grip on power despite not knowing which one of them should be Prime Minister.

We should have a General Election so that the UK population has a chance to put more effective people into Parliament.

The UK is currently in unprecedented times, and we look like a laughing stock around the world. 

This needs to change, and a General Election needs to take place.
attributes.background: Dissolve the UK Parliament and allow the country to have a General Election as soon as possible to allow the public to have a say in the current situation that has been created by those who supposedly are elected to help our (the UK Public) best interests.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
